name: pushTokenBack
title: Push Token Back - Reveal Tokens Buried Behind Each Other
description:
With Push Token Back you can float your cusor over foreground obstructing tokens, press a hot-key and send them to the back of stack. This allows you to access the token you want, even when was hidden behind others.

Push Button Back works on your own canvas so it will not confuse other players or alter their view.

Great for when the entire party falls into the same 5x5 pit.
author: David Zvekic
